website_summaries.verdict: This highly absorbable calcium supplement supports cardiovascular health, colon health, and much more.
pros: Formulated with pure ingredients that deliver predictable results
Free from wheat, gluten, egg, peanuts, magnesium stearate, hydrogenated fat, and artificial sweeteners and colors
cons: Does not contain vitamin D. More expensive than similar calcium supplements

customer_reviews.title: Bottle a little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and the bottle size were a little smaller than I was expecting based on the pictures. The pills are large capsules around 1.25 inches long. I made a video showing the packaging and the pill size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Best that I have tried - no abdominal distress
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several brands that seem to lead to abdominal pain. No problem with this brand. I take two pills at night to ward off menopause hot flash symptoms. It works for me. I ran out of this and the hot flashes immediately came back. Got the refill and for four days the hot flashes got less and less. Now they are gone again.
customer_reviews.author: JA KlingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best there is
customer_reviews.text: My doctor is a “longevity” MD and PharmD. He does micronutrient blood test every 6 mo. and needed calcium due to femor-neck deterioration on Dexa scans. Tried various brands and noticed that Pure Encapsulations was recommended by the Hartwigs in their book It Starts With Food, so use this product with Jarrow MK-7 for 12 months and not only slowed but REVERSED bone loss. 3 capsules 2x day. 68-year old athlete.
customer_reviews.author: N1ven

customer_reviews.title: Animal (Dairy) eater to Vegan
customer_reviews.text: I did research when I went vegan and found two types of calcium supplements, Carbonite (elemental) and these "citrate". I am taking both. I can say these do not have any side effects. I am not a calcium genius, but I can say I process these supplements a lot better than I did dairy (source of calcium).
customer_reviews.author: Jason MP

customer_reviews.title: Calcium is an important thing to add to an everyday diet.
customer_reviews.text: I take Calcium for my skeletal health, but do not like to combine it with other minerals; those other minerals are important, but I take them separately and not included in the same pill as my Calcium; therefore, this particular product is perfect for my own use and health.
customer_reviews.author: Theta Cerveri

customer_reviews.title: Great size and love that it's a capsule, not a tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I highly respect the quality of Pure. Love that I have finally found a calcium that I can easily swallow a couple times a day and not risk choking!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: I ask people not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for osteoporosis. I was taking 1000 mg. Serving size was 4 capsules. This one is 300 mg. and serving size is 2. I have to take 7 capsules to make equals to what I was taking. I’m very upset about having this product. I have to take 1200 mg. It means I have to take 8 capsules to make my right dose. I’ll never even look at this product.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Made my stomach upset
customer_reviews.text: These calcium supplements made me feel nauseous, and that was with taking them with food. Taking 2 only gives you 23% of your daily needs, so you would need to take these throughout the day. I am drinking fortified almond milk instead. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mac User

customer_reviews.title: calcium in capsules not giant tabs!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Pure calcium citrate for years. Unlike most calcium citrate pills which are huge hard lumps of compressed stuff- these pills from Pure Encapsulations are smaller, easy to swallow capsules! Pure is a very fine company.
customer_reviews.author: No Stone Left Unturned

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL WITH THIS PRODUCT IF YOU CANNOT TOLERATE ASCORBYL PALMITATE
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a substitute calcium product now that TwinLab Calcium Citrate has added D3 (which I can't tolerate) to their formula. Caused severe upset stomach and pain that lasted for a couple of days. Took only one pill to get this reaction. If you have problems with added vitamin C, this might not be the product for you. Also you might want to research ascorbic palmitate before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Surela

customer_reviews.title: Anytime I can order vitamins without additives I am happy. Love the fact that this is a magnesium ...
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I can order vitamins without additives I am happy. Love the fact that this is a magnesium stearate free product.
customer_reviews.author: Libelle

customer_reviews.title: To reach recommended dose, take 8/day
customer_reviews.text: Pure encapsulations products are typically excellent, so I felt comfortable purchasing the calcium citrate. I also wanted an easier to swallow option for Calcium. These are fairly easy to swallow because of being capsules. At my age, 1200mg per day of Calcium is recommended. That means 8 capsules! I never took more than 4 per day and it gave me an upset stomach. I stopped taking it and purchased another product. I'm going to see if I can return this, since I can't tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doc told me to take it. He said other types of calcium are not absorbed by your body.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chocianowski

customer_reviews.title: Are the side effects normal?
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a calcium supplement in Costco and felt that it helped with my teeth. Encouraged by this feeling, I did a little research and found out that supplement contains calcium carbonate that can lead to low absorbency. So I purchased this product. However, this product makes me nauseous and causes constipation. I think it still helps with bone strength. But the side effects worry me. Anyone has the same experience? Are they results of higher absorbency?
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. When my doctor told me my calcium levels were low I needed a supplement. I'd used PURE in the past with great results. They always agree with my system. Some vitamin supplements don't and I can get headaches with some. These have no side effects on me and I'm building my calcium levels.
customer_reviews.author: DazzlingDame

customer_reviews.title: Strong nails
customer_reviews.text: My nails were getting soft and I don't eat much, so added this to the regime. My nails are super hard now. No complaints, will continue buying :)
customer_reviews.author: shelley B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with no additive to make one ill.
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying to find a calcium pill that would not make me sick, this product is excellent. However, the one drawback is the capsule could be a 1/4 size smaller for easier swallowing.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McElroy

customer_reviews.title: It’s calcium
customer_reviews.text: It’s calcium ... Big pills to swallow but it doesn’t upset my stomach which is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Diana2dogs Painter

customer_reviews.title: Calcium good, but can't digest the capsule
customer_reviews.text: For anyone else who had stomach issues with these, it might be the capsule type. Once I started opening the pills and mixing them into yogurt, I was fine. This type of calcium is useful for pregnant people with MTHFR who shouldn't overdue calcium carbonate.
customer_reviews.author: IAN T LANZILLOTTI

customer_reviews.title: PURE Calcium ..good brand!
customer_reviews.text: I know, for sure, that these capsules are doing well for me. After i ran out of these for a week, ,my muscles began some serious cramping...legs and hands... which is not a normal for me..! I cant eat dairy, so these are a must for me. RECOMMEND I dont like fortified calcium because its easy to overdose on additives.
customer_reviews.author: R M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what I consumed when I took these, immediate return.

customer_reviews.text: When I received at first, the lit and sticker were already open. After I exchanged, the second one is okay but I do not think I will buy next time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand because I t doesn’t give me indigestion like regular vitamins

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mom because after having her cancer treatment her doctor recommended her to start taking calcium. I researched and found out that calcium citrate absorbs faster into the syste. She also has the Magnesium citrate and she’s had good results with these two

customer_reviews.title: Bottle less than half full
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was half full and the capsules were large. I was looking for calcium citrate that did not have magnesium so I thought I'd give this a try. I will not buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: More energetic
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom. She likes how she feels a couple of weeks after taking this supplement!

customer_reviews.text: didn’t try the product because the tamper proof seal had a hole that looked purposely cut in the middle. tried to get a return /exchange slip and kept getting an “error” message. pretty disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Most calcium supplements are big and chunky and hard to swallow, but these are very light and easy to swallow. I don't know if they are doing their job but I will continue to take them.

customer_reviews.title: Good supplements
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but I gave only four stars because they are too big for one to swallow.

customer_reviews.text: These pills are the same size and color of the 'pure' magnesium. My husband takes many pills and this has never happened before. I did not realize It, and some of the pills got mixed together. I could not tell which was which. I will not be buying either of these again.

customer_reviews.text: They go down my throat easy and I don't get heartburn after taking them.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product if you can afford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not pure - 16 mg vit C per 150 mg calcium/ cap
customer_reviews.text: It is pure calcium citrate (no vitamin D added) but it is 150 mg a cap, which make the product too expensive to my opinion. Won't order again if I find a calcium citrate in powder. -- BTW, if you are taking calcium to prevent kidney stones; vit C is not what you want with your calcium. Ok, there is no vitamin D. I should have checked the label more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: ED2012

customer_reviews.title: Gluten Free, Non GMO & Hypoallergenic Must be the Ticket
customer_reviews.text: I have always developed calcium deposits on my joints when taking calcium supplements. When I broke my foot in 6 places, my doctor told me I had to start taking a calcium supplement. A friend suggested I take pure calcium without added supplements so I went by the product reviews when I orders Pure. I'm on my second bottle of Pure and I have no bumps on my knuckles and no pain. I think the pureness of the product must be the difference. I'm in my 60's so being able to finally take calcium is a big deal to me. These are well worth the money if you have issues with other calcium supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MY THIRD ORDER
customer_reviews.text: So easy to swallow, so pure, once you use these you will never use any other brand again .No side effects ,no gas, easily absorbed. I threw out a half a bottle of Citracal because I knew I'd never use them again in comparison to these capsules you could choke on those other tablets. I'm only supposed to take 600 mg a day so nothing could be more perfect. Thank you Amazon there is no way I would have ever found this brand without you.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea??
customer_reviews.text: I never expected calcium to give me diarrhea. Makes me wonder if the manufacturer used magnesium instead. Not once in my life has calcium ever given me diarrhea and I've taken calcium for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: YellowJeep

customer_reviews.title: OMG, it took me years to figure out my ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, it took me years to figure out my calcium supplement was causing constipation. I switched to Calcium Citrate and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: lost child

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Line of Products
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled to find this Pure Brand on Amazon. Am looking for the Magnesium Citrate Malate too. I must take electrolyte and some supplemental. Pure is sold at a Holistic Pharmacy near from for nearly twice the price. Imagine my delight at finding this product on Amazon and with Prime, no other costs. Very pleased. Great line of products. As a Cancer and Tumor survivor who has bone and muscle issues too, I have tried many products. This line is quick to disperse, always consistent...
customer_reviews.author: redwillow

customer_reviews.title: Good but not a lot of bang for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like the clean ingredients. After some research, I like the formula of this calcium and absorbency. What I don't like is the fact it's weak. You have to take two capsules to get the suggested dosage. Even after the two pills you're only getting 23% DV! Most brands, even the least expensive deliver 60% DV with one pill. This is something clearly stated in the product description and I failed to notice after reading through all the good points the product has. Oh well. Let's see how it works.....I may take an extra pill a day for a 69% DV
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Rough on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: Tore up my stomach and gave me diarrhea. Not good if you have IBS and/or a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: taxpayinghorse h.

customer_reviews.title: Too many pills to get a larger dose
customer_reviews.text: I typically go for pure encapsulations when purchasing supplements because they are good quality and have no fillers. The only negative thing I can say about these is the fact that two large pills only equals 300 mg. I can’t do dairy so I have to take these multiple times a day to even get close to the recommended 1,000 mg for women who are pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: JoeNGina

customer_reviews.title: No digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bone cancer and I am in risk category for hip and spine breakage from bone thinning. Our doctor just told us to take calcium and I was leary of taking it because of an experience I had before when I tried to take calcium. I had severe digestive upset and quit taking it. We have been taking Pure Encapsulations for several weeks now and neither of us has had any digestive problems , so at this point I would definitely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure calcium citrate
customer_reviews.text: I had to have my broken tooth extracted, and want to get enough calcium for the next several months for the jaw bone to heal. I don't know if it's true, but I think that capsules disintegrate a lot better than tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but calcium
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like this calcium supplement because it is calcium citrate and not calcium carbonate. The capsules are easy to swallow and not horse pills like many calcium supplements. I also like that they do not contain other minerals and compounds like vitamin D, zinc and all that stuff which I prefer to take separately.
customer_reviews.author: JumpnJill

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve in liquid
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my tube fed daughter to get her adequate calcium without added vitamin D, magnesium or other ingredients... but these are constantly clogging up her feeding bag/tube. I am not sure why the powder does not dissolve... I have even tried emptying the powder into liquid and letting it sit for hours before giving and it still does not dissolve. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I wanted Calcium Citrate without Vitamin D, or any ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted Calcium Citrate without Vitamin D, or any other Vitamins Added with the Calcium. The capsules are Gluten -Free Non GMO, and Hyperallergenic. The Capsules are not difficult to swallow with water.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these after a recommendation from my orthopedic doctor following identical hairline stress fractures in both my knees. After 10 weeks I finally got the okay to start jogging again so 🤞. They are big pills but no weird aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find this in capsule form
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended calcium citrate. Mostly this comes in large hard to swallow tablets. These are capsules and super easy to swallow. I will be ordering on a regular basis!

customer_reviews.title: Good calcium but not enough!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to swallow and digest. My only problem is that taking two is not sufficient calcium for many people who need a calcium supplement. I take three twice a day which makes the bottle not last very long. But I do like them more than other calcium supplements I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: luluK

I've been avoiding calcium for years and don't drink milk due to allergies, so my body must have been rejoicing!

customer_reviews.title: love these, but problem with seal
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problems as many others. Purchased this and there was a hole in the seal. Ordered a replacement-same problem. Returned both-ordered somewhere else-no problems. I think it was stored in a hot warehouse and the seal stuck to the lid. Other than that, I love these vitamins and when I'm not on them I can tell. I hope they get the seal problem figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

The gel caps get stuck after I swallow and I have no trouble swallowing other pills. I just took a bite of food after taking them and they went down just fine.

product_meta.title: Pure Encapsulations - Calcium (Citrate) - Hypoallergenic, Highly-Absorbable Calcium Supplement - 180 Capsules
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingMultiple randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled studies have reported statistically significant positive results using calcium supplementation to help reduce the risk of osteoporosis for both women and men. Calcium has also demonstrated the ability to provide a supportive effect on cardiovascular health by promoting healthy receptor function and healthy lipid metabolism. Additionally, calcium has been associated with supporting distal colon health.*
feature_bullets: Cardiovascular Health: Highly absorbable calcium, which supports cardiovascular health.*
Colon Health: Additionally, calcium has been associated with supporting colon health*
Bone Support: Calcium in the citrate forms are highly bioavailable calcium supplements, providing support for bone, cardiovascular and colon health.*

Pure Ingredients: Pure Encapsulations manufactures a line of hypoallergenic, research-based dietary supplements. Products are meticulously formulated using pure ingredients designed to deliver predictable results for the benefit of all patients, even the most sensitive.*

Free From: Pure Encapsulations products are free from wheat, gluten, egg, peanuts, magnesium stearate, hydrogenated fat, artificial sweeteners and colors, and other unnecessary excipients. Any product containing ingredients derived from allergens, such as soy, dairy or shellfish is clearly labeled. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
